alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A narrow band of torrential rainfall in northeastern Worcester and north central Middlesex Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 157 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms thunderstorm over Lancaster, or near Leominster. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Leominster, Fitchburg, Pepperell, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Littleton, Lancaster, Sterling, Ayer, Shirley and Harvard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County
